short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get good quotes in every new tab you open

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this chrome extension to get inspiration, love, business and other quotes to be shown on your home screen without any links or anything else.

It's simple and unique. Quotes also changes every-time to refresh or open a new tab.

You people like dark mode more that's why i have built this in all black.
